mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (username, nickname, dept_id, phone_number, status, remark) VALUES (#{username}, #{nickname}, #{deptId}, #{phoneNumber}, #{status}, #{remark})
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET username = #{userDto.username}, nickname = #{userDto.nickname}, dept_id = #{userDto.deptId}, phone_number = #{userDto.phoneNumber}, status = #{userDto.status}, remark = #{userDto.remark} WHERE user_id = #{userId}
